page.title: 03A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SARAH
page.content: I wake up at 7.ooam and I have my breakfast. I usually have toast for breakfast with marmalade or marmite. Then I have to go to school on the bus. I do a lot of hard work at school. My favorite work is English and needlework. When I get home I play with my computer or I do some knitting. I sometimes play with Hayley because she lives in Icomb. I sometimes help my mum do the washing up. I go to bed at 8.00pm. My mum and dad go to bed at 9.oopm. I have got 1 guineapig, 12 fish, 1 bird, 1 dog, 4 chickens and 1 cat.
